name: Pushy and Pully in Blockland
summary: Pushy and Pully in Blockland is an endearing co-op arcade game that will take you and a friend through ever-challenging levels. Kill monsters, match blocks, defeats bosses. Recover your spaceship and escape Blockland.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 游戏类型: ACT
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 2人
  • 发行日期: 2020年5月4日
  • 官方网站: pushyandpully.com
  • 开发: Resistance Studio
  • 发行: Resistance Studio
